summary: Relive Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame On The Big Screen
title: Relive Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame On The Big Screen
body:
Relive Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame On The Big Screen before it’s gone! #ILoveYou3000

This weekend select cinemas nationwide will hold a Bring Back event for fans to see Marvel Studios’ AVENGERS: ENDGAME one more time on the big screen before it leaves cinemas.

Fans will be treated to a video introduction by director Anthony Russo and an unfinished deleted scene from the film. It will also be a chance for fans to get a head start on the upcoming Marvel Studios’ “Spider-Man: Far…

summary: Exclusive: Avengers: Endgame Re-Release Will Feature Over 6 Minutes of Post-Credit Content
title: Exclusive: Avengers: Endgame Re-Release Will Feature Over 6 Minutes of Post-Credit Content
body:
Exclusive: Avengers: Endgame Re-Release Will Feature Over 6 Minutes of Post-Credit Content

The upcoming Avengers: Endgame re-release that will hit theaters on Friday, June 28th will feature over six minutes of post-credit content.

My source tells me that Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame will include two new pieces of content for the re-release.

The first piece of content is an 18 second introduction to the film from co-director Anthony Russo that will play before each feature film.

Th…

summary: Report: 7-Year-Old Avengers: Endgame Actress Lexi Rabe Bullied For "Possible Whitewashing of Ironheart"
title: Report: 7-Year-Old Avengers: Endgame Actress Lexi Rabe Bullied For "Possible Whitewashing of Ironheart"
body:
Report: 7-Year-Old Avengers: Endgame Actress Lexi Rabe Bullied For “Possible Whitewashing of Ironheart”

Jessica Rabe, actress Lexi Rabe’s mother, reports her daughter is being bullied. Lexi Rabe played the daughter of Tony Stark and Pepper Potts, Morgan Stark, in Avengers: Endgame. She gave us the iconic phrase, “I love you 3000!”

Jessica Rabe posted to Lexi’s Instagram account and wrote, “Yet again Lexi’s getting bullied.” Rabe goes on to state, “Please keep your opinions to yourself so Lexi can…

body:
Haha. Yeah, nah.

So just saw that Marvel were re-releasing Avengers: Endgame with a new end credit scene and all I can say is that unless that scene is them reversing the absolute mess they made of Steve Rogers’ character, than I ain’t interested!

summary: Marvel’s ‘Avengers: Endgame’ re-release is Money Grab & doesn't Deserve the top-grossing film of all time spot.
title: Marvel’s ‘Avengers: Endgame’ re-release is Money Grab & doesn't Deserve the top-grossing film of all time spot.
body:
Marvel’s ‘Avengers: Endgame’ re-release is Money Grab & doesn’t Deserve the top-grossing film of all time spot.

Marvel says that the new content would be a video introduction by director Anthony Russo, an unfinished deleted scene, and a special Spider-Man: Far From Home sneak peek and fans will also get an exclusive piece of Avengers art. The art is a poster with the “I love you 3000” that Iron Man hit us within the movie. This is not much at all but it will be more than enough to sadly sucker enough…

View On WordPress

excerpt: The upcoming re-release of Avengers: Endgame will include, among other things, an extra scene featuring the Hulk once the credits have rolled.

title: Avengers: Endgame Release Details Emerge
body:
Avengers: Endgame Release Details Emerge

Avengers: Endgame is getting a second theatrical release to shore up that box office record, and details of the value-added features have emerged.

The film is closing in on Avatar‘s #1 all-time box office record. And to get over the last few hurdles, Disney will re-release the film to theaters this Friday. But according to Fandango, Marvel will include a video introduction from co-director…

title: Se liberan el póster para el reestreno de Avengers: Endgame
body:
Se liberan el póster para el reestreno de Avengers: Endgame

A partir del viernes 28 de junio, los cines participantes de todo EUA celebrarán un evento Bring Back para que los fanáticos vean los Avengers: Endgame una vez más en la pantalla grande antes de que termine su ciclo, otra vez.

Los fanáticos que compren una entrada para el cine recibirán una pieza exclusiva de arte de los Avengers(disponible en teatros selectos y hasta que se agoten los…

summary: ESTO ES LO QUE INCLUIRÁN LAS ESCENAS ADICIONALES DE AVENGERS: ENDGAME EN SU REESTRENO #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos...
title: ESTO ES LO QUE INCLUIRÁN LAS ESCENAS ADICIONALES DE AVENGERS: ENDGAME EN SU REESTRENO #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Cine #Marvel #AVENGERSENDGAME
body:
Como se había mencionado la semana pasada, Avengers: Endgame tendrá un reestreno con escenas adicionales en los Estados Unidos éste fin de semana (y aunque varios medios han reportado que en México se reestrenará el 27 de junio, hasta el momento ninguna de las cadenas de cine lo han confirmado). Ahora ya sabemos en qué consisten esas escenas nuevas.

A diferencia de otros reestrenos de…

body:
Marvel Confirms the #AvengersEndgame Re-release and Bonus Features

This morning Marvel officially confirmed the Avengers: Endgame re-release for this weekend, which Kevin Feige revealed to everyone last week.

summary:
Avengers: Endgame, Marvel Entertainment rivela i contenuti aggiuntivi della versione estesa

A 2 mesi dall'uscita ed un incasso...
caption:
Avengers: Endgame, Marvel Entertainment rivela i contenuti aggiuntivi della versione estesa

A 2 mesi dall'uscita ed un incasso davvero stellare, Avengers: Endgame ha alla fine battuto anche il grande blockbuster di James Cameron son il risultato al botteghino migliore di sempre, anche se comunque si dovrà poi fare la somma con gli incassi della ri-uscita - contando anche quelli, oltre ovviamente all'inflazione, Endgame non ha ancora superato Avatar.

summary: AVENGERS: ENDGAME 'Bring Back' Events Starts Friday! Here's The New Poster!
title: AVENGERS: ENDGAME 'Bring Back' Events Starts Friday! Here's The New Poster!
body:
AVENGERS: ENDGAME ‘Bring Back’ Events Starts Friday! Here’s The New Poster!

#MarvelStudios has unleashed this new poster for #AvengersEndgame movie. See the year’s number one movie on the big screen one more time before it leaves theaters!

Starting on Friday, June 28, participating theaters nationwide will hold a Bring Back event for fans to see Marvel Studios’ AVENGERS: ENDGAME one more time on the big screen before it finishes its theatrical run.

Fans who buy a movie…

AVENGERS: ENDGAME ‘Bring Back’ Events Starts Friday! Here’s The New Poster!

External image

#MarvelStudios has unleashed this new poster for #AvengersEndgame movie. See the year’s number one movie on the big screen one more time before it leaves theaters!

Starting on Friday, June 28, participating theaters nationwide will hold a Bring Back event for fans to see Marvel Studios’ AVENGERS: ENDGAME one more time on the big screen before it finishes its theatrical run.
